administrative-circaDateCreated.title: Circa Date Created
administrative-circaDateCreated.description: Approximate date or range of dates associated with the creation and production of a video.

administrative-contentWarning.title: Content Warning
administrative-contentWarning.description: Information to warn potential viewers about nudity, violence etc in the video

administrative-dateCreated.title: Date Created
administrative-dateCreated.description: Designates the date and optionally the time the content of the video was created (rather than the date of the creation of the digital representation)

administrative-dateModified.title: Date Modified
administrative-dateModified.description: Date and optionally time when the video was modified last time

administrative-dateReleased.title: Date Released
administrative-dateReleased.description: Date and optionally time of the public release of the video

administrative-digitalSourceType.title: Digital Source Type
administrative-digitalSourceType.description: The type of the source of this digital video, including whether the video was captured, digitised or generated.

administrative-episode.title: Episode
administrative-episode.description: Episode in a specific season of a TV or video series this video is a member of.

administrative-externalMetadataLinks.title: External Metadata URL
administrative-externalMetadataLinks.description: Link(s) to an external web resource for retrieval of further metadata about this video

administrative-feedIdentifier.title: Feed Identifier
administrative-feedIdentifier.description: Identifier of the feed/source this video was delivered by

administrative-identifier.title: Video Identifier
administrative-identifier.description: Globally unambiguous identifier of the video regardless of renditions, formats, encodings etc. This identifier should be shared across all renditions.

administrative-metadataAuthority.title: Metadata Authority
administrative-metadataAuthority.description: Party responsible for the accuracy of the metadata values.

administrative-metadataLastEdited.title: Metadata Edit Date
administrative-metadataLastEdited.description: Date of the last edit of the metadata of this video.

administrative-metadataLastEditor.title: Metadata Editor
administrative-metadataLastEditor.description: Party doing the last edit of the metadata of this video.

administrative-parentId.title: Parent Video Identifier
administrative-parentId.description: Globally unambiguous identifier of the video from which this video was derived.

administrative-planningRefs.title: Planning Reference
administrative-planningRefs.description: Reference to a data item used for planning the shooting of this video

administrative-publicationEvents.title: Publication Event
administrative-publicationEvents.description: Date and optionally the time of publishing this video with name and identifier for the event of this publication.

administrative-ratings.title: Rating
administrative-ratings.description: How the video is classified by a public authority such as MPA

administrative-recordingDevice.title: Recording Device
administrative-recordingDevice.description: Device used for recording this video

administrative-registryEntries.title: Registry Entry
administrative-registryEntries.description: Identifier of the video issued by an identified registry.

administrative-releaseReady.title: Ready for Release
administrative-releaseReady.description: An indicator if this video is ready for being released to the public. This depends on rules by the party responsible for the publication.

administrative-rendition.title: Video Rendition
administrative-rendition.description: Unambiguous identifier of the video specific to a rendition.

administrative-reviewRatings.title: Review Rating
administrative-reviewRatings.description: An aesthetic rating given to the video by an external reviewer such as a news outlet

administrative-season.title: Season
administrative-season.description: Season of a TV or video series this video is a member of.

administrative-series.title: Series
administrative-series.description: TV or video series this video is a member of.

administrative-storylineIdentifiers.title: Storyline Identifier
administrative-storylineIdentifiers.description: Identifier(s) of a story evolving over time with which this video is associated

administrative-stylePeriod.title: Style Period
administrative-stylePeriod.description: The style, historical or artistic period, movement, group, or school whose characteristics are represented by the video

administrative-temporalCoverage.title: Temporal Coverage
administrative-temporalCoverage.description: Period of time covered by the video

administrative-videoVersion.title: Video Version
administrative-videoVersion.description: Version of the video identified by the Video Identifier

administrative-workflowRating.title: Workflow Rating
administrative-workflowRating.description: An aesthetic rating given to the video by its creator or editor, for example to mark the best take of a series

administrative-workflowTag.title: Workflow Tag
administrative-workflowTag.description: Indicator for the role of this video in a production workflow.

describing a/v content-aboutCvTerms.title: CV Term About the Content
describing a/v content-aboutCvTerms.description: What the video is about expressed by term(s) selected from taxonomies or controlled vocabularies

describing a/v content-altTextAccessibil.title: Alt Text (Accessibility)
describing a/v content-altTextAccessibil.description: A brief textual description of the purpose and meaning of a video that can be accessed by assistive technology or displayed when the video is disabled in the browser. It should not exceed 250 characters.

describing a/v content-dataOnScreen.title: Data Displayed on Screen
describing a/v content-dataOnScreen.description: Text or other data shown in some region of the video.

describing a/v content-description.title: Description
describing a/v content-description.description: Textual description of the content of the video

describing a/v content-dopesheetLinks.title: Dopesheet Link
describing a/v content-dopesheetLinks.description: Link(s) to an external web resource providing a shotlist with descriptions

describing a/v content-extDescrAccessibi.title: Extended Description (Accessibility)
describing a/v content-extDescrAccessibi.description: A more detailed textual description of the purpose and meaning of a video that elaborates on the information provided by the Alt Text (Accessibility) property. This property does not have a character limitation and is not required if the Alt Text (Accessibility) field sufficiently describes the video.

describing a/v content-featuredOrganisat.title: Featured Organisation
describing a/v content-featuredOrganisat.description: Organisation(s) featured by the content of the video

describing a/v content-genres.title: Genre
describing a/v content-genres.description: Artistic, style, journalistic, product or other genre(s) of the video.

describing a/v content-headline.title: Headline
describing a/v content-headline.description: Short description of the content of the video

describing a/v content-keywords.title: Keywords
describing a/v content-keywords.description: What the video is about expressed by a free choice of descriptive phrases or keywords

describing a/v content-locationsCreated.title: Location Shot
describing a/v content-locationsCreated.description: Place from where the video was shot, in particular where the camera was located

describing a/v content-personsHeard.title: Person Heard
describing a/v content-personsHeard.description: Person(s) who can be heard only in the video

describing a/v content-productsShown.title: Product Shown
describing a/v content-productsShown.description: Product(s) identified by a GTIN code shown by the video

describing a/v content-snapshotLinks.title: Snapshot Link
describing a/v content-snapshotLinks.description: A still image representing  the video.

describing a/v content-timedTextLinks.title: Timed Text Link
describing a/v content-timedTextLinks.description: Link(s) to an external web resource providing a timed text track, used to provide captioning/subtitling or audio description of the video

describing a/v content-title.title: Title
describing a/v content-title.description: Title of the video, should be a shorthand reference

describing a/v content-transcriptLinks.title: Transcript Link
describing a/v content-transcriptLinks.description: Link(s) to an external web resource providing a transcription of the video

describing a/v content-visualColour.title: Visual Colour
describing a/v content-visualColour.description: The visual colouring of the video.

rights-contributors.title: Contributor
rights-contributors.description: Party or parties (person or organisation) which contributed to the video, refinement by the role attribute.

rights-copyrightNotice.title: Copyright Notice
rights-copyrightNotice.description: Any textual notice necessary by legal needs or common use to indicate the current owner of the copyright of this media resource

rights-copyrightOwners.title: Copyright Owner
rights-copyrightOwners.description: Data identifying the individual or organisation owning the rights for this media resource which could be the video as a whole or a clip in a video. The optional role attribute may indicate which facet of rights is covered by this entity.

rights-copyrightYear.title: Copyright Year
rights-copyrightYear.description: Year of origin of the video, usually appearing in the copyright notice as a numeric value

rights-creators.title: Creator
rights-creators.description: Party or parties (person or organisation) which created the video, refinement by the role attribute.

rights-creditLine.title: Credit Line
rights-creditLine.description: Credit to person(s) and/or organisation(s) required by the supplier of the video (clip) to be used when published.

rights-embdEncRightsExpr.title: Embedded Encoded Rights Expression
rights-embdEncRightsExpr.description: Structure covering the assertion of rights, the granting of licenses and both in human and a machine readable ways (including restrictions, embargoes, duties ...)

rights-licensor.title: Licensor
rights-licensor.description: Company or person to  be contacted for licensing

rights-linkedEncRightsExpr.title: Linked Encoded Rights Expression
rights-linkedEncRightsExpr.description: Structure covering the assertion of rights, the granting of licenses and both in human and a machine readable ways (including restrictions, embargoes, duties ...)

rights-modelReleaseDocuments.title: Model Release Document
rights-modelReleaseDocuments.description: Identifier(s) of a Model Release document.

rights-modelReleaseStatus.title: Model Release Status
rights-modelReleaseStatus.description: Summarises the availability and scope of model releases authorizing usage of the likenesses of persons appearing in the video

rights-propertyReleaseDocuments.title: Property Release Document
rights-propertyReleaseDocuments.description: Identifier(s) of a Property Release document.

rights-propertyReleaseStatus.title: Property Release Status
rights-propertyReleaseStatus.description: Summarises the availability and scope of property releases authorising usage of the properties appearing in the photograph.

rights-supplier.title: Supplier
rights-supplier.description: Supplier of this copy of the media resource

rights-supplyChainSources.title: Source (Supply Chain)
rights-supplyChainSources.description: Person or party who has a role in the content supply chain.

technical-audioBitRate.title: Audio Bitrate
technical-audioBitRate.description: Bit rate of the audio data depending on the Video Bit Rate Type: if fixed the fixed rate, if variable the maximum rate. The unit is bits per second.

technical-audioBitRateType.title: Audio Bitrate Type
technical-audioBitRateType.description: Indicates if the bitrate of the audio data is fixed or variable

technical-audioBitsPerSample.title: Audio Bits per Sample
technical-audioBitsPerSample.description: Number of bits used for an audio sample

technical-audioCoding.title: Audio Coding
technical-audioCoding.description: Machine readable code and a human readable term for the used audio coding

technical-audioSampleRate.title: Audio Sample Rate
technical-audioSampleRate.description: Rate used for sampling the audio

technical-editorialDurationEnds.title: Editorial Duration End
technical-editorialDurationEnds.description: The point in time and frames the content proposed for editorial use ends

technical-editorialDurationStarts.title: Editorial Duration Start
technical-editorialDurationStarts.description: The point in time and frames the content proposed for editorial use starts

technical-editorialDurations.title: Editorial Duration
technical-editorialDurations.description: Duration of the video content proposed for editorial use

technical-fileBitrate.title: File Bitrate
technical-fileBitrate.description: The total bit rate of the all media streams in this file.

technical-fileDuration.title: File Duration
technical-fileDuration.description: Duration of the overall video (from the first to the last frame)

technical-fileFormat.title: File Format
technical-fileFormat.description: Format of the file containing the video data.

technical-frameSize.title: Frame Size
technical-frameSize.description: Size of the video frame in pixels

technical-mediaType.title: Media Type
technical-mediaType.description: IANA Media Type of the video.

technical-orientation.title: Orientation
technical-orientation.description: Orientation of the visual content of the video as defined by TIFF.

technical-signalAspectRatio.title: Signal Aspect Ratio
technical-signalAspectRatio.description: Ratio of width and height in pixels of a frame

technical-signalFormat.title: Signal Format
technical-signalFormat.description: Combined term including the size of the frame, interlaced/progressive, framerate

technical-streamReady.title: Stream-ready
technical-streamReady.description: Indicates if this video can be used for streaming by the rule of having the key technical data of the video at the start rather than end of the file and that the wrapper and essense format are suitable for streaming

technical-videoBitrate.title: Video Bitrate
technical-videoBitrate.description: Bit rate of the video data depending on the Video Bit Rate Type: if fixed the fixed rate, if variable the maximum rate. The unit is bits per second.

technical-videoBitrateType.title: Video Bitrate Type
technical-videoBitrateType.description: Indicates if the bitrate of the video data is fixed or variable

technical-videoCoding.title: Video Coding
technical-videoCoding.description: Machine readable code and a human readable term for the used video coding

technical-videoDisplayAspectRatio.title: Display Aspect Ratio
technical-videoDisplayAspectRatio.description: Ratio of width and height of the displayed image. (Width and height do not require to be in pixels.)

technical-videoEncodingProfile.title: Video Profile
technical-videoEncodingProfile.description: Name of the used video profile as defined by the maker of the encoding standard.
